trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed removal of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> from a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示建議將 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 從執行中工作流程執行個體內的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the index of the activity being removed when you remove the activity using the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: 指出當您使用工作流程變更移除活動時，要移除的活動其索引。

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which the activity was removed.
trans-unit.target: 所移除之活動來源的根活動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of original <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> being removed.
trans-unit.target: 取得要移除之原始 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the original <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> being removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之原始 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets index of the removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> collection of the parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 以父代 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> 集合，取得所移除 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> being removed.
trans-unit.target: 正要移除之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的索引。
